The Barolong Ba Seleka cultural village in Thaba Nchu remains a white elephant\n
Community center to handle local issues\n
Traditional authority of Thaba Nchu

The cultural village is a Setswana themed cultural establishment aimed at providing public information about the tradition, norms and cultures of the Barolong and Batswana clan. The village consists of a museum, arts and craft market, traditional restaurant, an amphitheatre, homestay accommodation and guest houses for visitors.
